curriculum.name: 5th Grade Math
curriculum.description: Math covering whole number operations, algebraic reasoning, financial literacy, decimal place value, adding decimals, subtracting decimals, decimal multiplication, decimal division, addition and subtraction of fractions, multiplication and division of whole numbers by a fraction, geometry, measurement, volume, perimeter, areas, and patterns on a coordinate plane.
